title: Hour 1: Tom's Qualms
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. and "Mad Dog" Chris Russo debate if Aaron Rodgers should accept more accountability for the Packers Week 1 loss to the Vikings. Kimberly A. Martin joins the show to unpack new comments from Tom Brady about his commitment to football and discuss if it's a concerning sign for a Bucs Super Bowl run. Domonique Foxworth is here with reaction to the NBA's suspension of Suns owner Robert Sarver after an investigation into workplace misconduct. Plus, the crew debates whether Herbert or Mahomes will come out on top in their Week 2 matchup.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Should the Buccaneers be worried about Tom Brady's commitment to a Super Bowl run?
